body:
hello! i'm caleb. a couple of you may know me.

i've been on for two years and going on avicus isn't that much fun anymore, to be honest.

if you'd like to talk, my instagram and snapchat are caleb.nyc

thanks to (off the top of my head) ques, kingsm, narwhal, porky, and probably a bunch of others i forget. probably because you changed your name.

love y'all 

/out

edit: 
oh, and (shameless plug) if you'd like to find some cool new music, i absolutely love sharing music. follow me or not, heres my soundcloud. hopefully i can leave someone with some happiness :) 
https://soundcloud.com/thehollow

title: leaving avicus!

replies.body: Bye, good luck and have fun with life! :(
replies.body_tagged: Bye, good luck and have fun with life! :(

replies.body:
Noooo caleb!!
I hate to see ya go man, we go way back! :)
replies.body_tagged:
Noooo caleb!!
I hate to see ya go man, we go way back! :)

replies.body:
Hey Caleb
Sad to see you go we never talked but I can trust you were mad, awesome & a great person. Hope all goes well for you in the future man!
See you around.

replies.body:
C ya man

thx for being awesome

replies.body: Adios, maybe visit from time to time :)
